ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of SUSAN LEWIS, C.M., O.M., of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
